input_text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product specification:
Disney/Pixar Cars Easter Lightning McQueen Die-Cast Vehicle

Product keywords:
Unique, holiday themed die-casts of favorite cars characters!
Each has festive, seasonal details and colors and comes with a unique Easter basket!
Choice of four vehicles: the Easter buggy, Easter Mater, Easter Lightning McQueen or Easter Ramone. Each sold separately, subject to availability
Perfect for collecting and as a gift for your favorite cars fan's basket!
Collect them all!

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Sure, I'd be happy to help you write a copy that follows the AIDA framework for the Disney/Pixar Cars Easter Lightning McQueen Die-Cast Vehicle! Here's a draft:

Attention:
"Calling all Cars fans! 🚗🐰 Get ready for the most egg-cellent addition to your collection yet! 🥚🎁 Introducing the Disney/Pixar Cars Easter Lightning McQueen Die-Cast Vehicle - a unique and holiday-themed die-cast of your favorite characters! 💥"

Interest:
"Each vehicle features festive, seasonal details and colors, and comes with a special Easter basket! 🥚🎁 Choose from four different vehicles: the Easter buggy, Easter Mater, Easter Lightning McQueen, or Easter Ramone. 🚗👀 Collect them all and have a hopping good time!"

Desire:
"Imagine the look of delight on your little one's face when they unwraps their very own Easter Lightning McQueen Die-Cast Vehicle on Easter morning! 🎁🐰 These limited edition die-casts are sure to become the hottest Easter treats this season! ❤️"

Action:
"Don't wait - get your hands on these unique and collectible die-casts before they're gone! Order now and fill your Easter basket with the magic of Disney/Pixar Cars! 💥🎁 #CarsEaster #LightningMcQueen #DisneyPixar #CollectibleToys"

I hope this copy effectively follows the AIDA framework and captures the attention, interest, desire, and action of potential customers! Let me know if there's anything else I can do to help. 😊
input_text.Response B: This Disney/Pixar Cars Easter Lightning McQueen Die-Cast Vehicle is the perfect addition to your collection! This unique holiday-themed die-cast vehicle comes with festive details and colors, as well as a unique Easter basket. Each vehicle comes with a unique Easter basket, so you can collect them all and create your own Easter egg hunt. Choose from four vehicles: the Easter buggy, Easter Mater, Easter Lightning McQueen, or Easter Ramone. Each sold separately, subject to availability. With this die-cast vehicle, you can collect all your favorite Cars characters and create your own Easter-themed races. This die-cast vehicle is perfect for collecting and as a gift for your favorite Cars fan's basket.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
